typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SalesAmount as double,
		TotalProductCost as double,
		ProductStandardCost as double,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct as boolean,
		ExtendedAmount as double,
		UnitPrice as double,
		OrderQuantity as short,
		SalesTerritoryId as short,
		OrderDate as date,
		ProductId as short,
		SalesOrderLineId as integer,
		Channel as string,
		SalesOrder as string,
		CustomerId as string,
		ResellerId as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Sales',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> SalesSource
source(output(
		CustomerKey as integer,
		CustomerId as string,
		Customer as string,
		City as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		PostalCode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'CustomerData',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> DimCustomerSource
source(output(
		PostalCode as string,
		CountryRegion as string,
		StateProvince as string,
		City as string,
		Reseller as string,
		BusinessType as string,
		ResellerId as string,
		ResellerKey as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworks',
	tableName: 'Reseller',
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> DimResellerSource
source(output(
		Channel as string,
		ChannelTypeKey as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'DimChannel') ~> DimChannelSource
DimCustomerSource select(mapColumn(
		CustomerKey,
		CustomerId_lookup = CustomerId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DimCustomerSelect
DimResellerSource select(mapColumn(
		ResellerId_lookup = ResellerId,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> DimResellerSelect
DimChannelSource select(mapColumn(
		Channel_lookup = Channel,
		ChannelTypeKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimChannelSelect
SalesSource, DimChannelSelect lookup(Channel == Channel_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> DimChannelLookup
DimChannelLookup, DimCustomerSelect lookup(CustomerId == CustomerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lookup1
lookup1, DimResellerSelect lookup(ResellerId == ResellerId_lookup,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> lookup2
lookup2 select(mapColumn(
		SalesAmount,
		TotalProductCost,
		ProductStandardCost,
		UnitPriceDiscountPct,
		ExtendedAmount,
		UnitPrice,
		OrderQuantity,
		SalesTerritoryId,
		OrderDate,
		ProductId,
		SalesOrderLineId,
		SalesOrder,
		ChannelTypeKey,
		CustomerKey,
		ResellerKey
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select1
select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	store: 'synapse',
	databaseType: 'spark',
	format: 'table',
	database: 'adworkstarget',
	tableName: 'FactSales',
	recreate:true,
	manifestType: 'manifest') ~> FactSalesSink
